local_intent: Perceive the T-block, approach from above workspace and align to it with tight tolerance; verify continued visibility.
assumptions: Visibility after alignment is a sufficient lightweight verification before contact in this phase.
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT approach phase: detect then ApproachAndAlign(t_block_gray, tol=0.005, timeout=1200). Leaves orientation/contact/push steps to later subtrees.
